attr.title: Heirloom
attr.desc: A small 2D platformer. Run, jump and avoid obstacles through 4 challenging levels. Explore a beautiful, hand-crafted pixel world. Meet captivating NPCs and reach the Old Summit to retrieve the family Heirloom.
attr.inst: Purchase the game on Steam or Itch.io and copy all files into the assets folder. You can also download the free demo from Steam.
attr.inst_md: Purchase the game on [Steam](https://store.steampowered.com/app/2315570/Heirloom/) or [Itch.io](https://atticusfinn.itch.io/heirloom) and copy all files into the `assets` folder. You can also download the free demo from Steam.
